creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: one from a collection of 117 shadow puppet heads. 58 pairs and two single heads placed in glassine envelopes. Heads measure 2-5 in., each.  Note Later measuring revealed 57 pairs and three single heads, #24, the heads are attached by a string to each other.
title: Shadow Puppet Head
